actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Natasha Susan Middelmann, Samantha Abigail Middelmann, Naomi Katrina Orloff Middelmann, and Hannah Emily Middelmann.

summary.text: Declares that, for the purpose of determining the nationality and citizenship of four named minor children, certain periods during which their mother lived in Switzerland shall be counted in determining whether she satisfied the physical presence requirement of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Natasha Susan Middelmann, Samantha Abigail Middelmann, Naomi Katrina Orloff Middelmann, and Hannah Emily Middelmann.
